function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "D" then set_stone( "st-death", i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then abyss(i-1,line) elseif c == "=" then fill_floor("fl-bluegreen", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c == "+" then fill_floor("fl-space", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c == "a" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="openclose", target="door1"}) elseif c == "A" then set_stone("st-door", i-1, line , {name="door1", type="v"}) elseif c == "z" then set_actor("ac-blackball", i-1+1,line+.5) elseif c == "d" then --1-d set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=1}) elseif c == "u" then --2-u set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=2}) elseif c == "r" then --3-r set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=3}) elseif c == "l" then --4-l set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=4}) elseif c == "1" then --ur set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=11}) elseif c == "3" then --dl set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=9}) elseif c == "7" then --dr set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=12}) elseif c == "9" then --ul set_floor("fl-gradient", i-1, line, {type=10}) end end end
